prompt: Add user 'Alice' (alice@example.com) to the 'backend-team' on GitHub. Create a welcome email to her with the subject 'Welcome to the Team' and body 'Glad to have you!'. Schedule a 'Kickoff Meeting' with her for next Monday at 10 AM. Report the actions taken.
gold_response: Added Alice to 'backend-team' on GitHub. Sent welcome email to alice@example.com. Scheduled 'Kickoff Meeting' for next Monday at 10 AM.

rubric.criteria: The agent must add 'Alice' to the 'backend-team' on GitHub using the add_to_team tool.
The agent must send an email to 'alice@example.com' with the correct subject and body.
The agent must schedule a calendar event 'Kickoff Meeting' for next Monday at 10 AM.
The agent must report all three actions taken.
